Yesterday afternoon in Binh Duong, a
man driving a motorbike caused himself an accident
leading to
death. According to initial information, around 4:40 pm
Mr. Le Trong Dai, 39 years old from Binh Thuan,
was driving a motorbike.  Driving on Pham

An city, when reaching the public road near alley 82,

hit a green tree, causing Manh to crash.
Mr. Dai hit his head on a tree and fell

to the hospital for emergency treatment but
later died. Receiving news, Di An city police
were present to examine the scene and
extract the camera to clarify the cause.  At
7:30 p.m., the scene was completely examined.
